    Class Description
    BaseCommandReader
    Basic functionality for CommandReader for RecordStorageEngine.
    BaseRecordScan
    Maintains state when performing batched scans, potentially from multiple threads.
    BatchContext  
    CacheAccessBackDoor

    Command implementations for all the commands that can be performed on a Neo store.

    CommandVisitor
    An interface for dealing with commands, either reading or writing them.
    CommandVisitor.Adapter
    An empty implementation of a CommandVisitor.
    DirectionWrapper  
    DirectRecordAccess
    Provides direct access to records in a store.
    DirectRecordAccess.DirectRecordProxy  
    EntityCommandGrouper
    Groups property commands by entity.
    EntityCommandGrouper.Cursor
    Interaction goes like this: Call EntityCommandGrouper.Cursor.nextEntity() to go to the next group, if any A group may or may not have the entity command, as accessed by EntityCommandGrouper.Cursor.currentEntityCommand(), either way the node id is accessible using EntityCommandGrouper.Cursor.currentEntityId() Call EntityCommandGrouper.Cursor.nextProperty() until it returns null, now all the Command.PropertyCommand in this group have been accessed
    HighIdTransactionApplier.HighId  
    IdGeneratorUpdateWork  
    IndexActivator
    Delayed activation of indexes.
    IndexUpdates
    Set of updates (IndexEntryUpdate) to apply to indexes.
    IndexUpdatesWork
    Combines IndexUpdates from multiple transactions into one bigger job.
    IntegrityValidator
    Validates data integrity during the prepare phase of TransactionRecordState.
    Loaders  
    NeoStoresDiagnostics  
    PhysicalLogCommandReaderV3_0_10.IndexCommandHeader  
    PropertyCommandsExtractor
    Gathers node/property commands by node id, preparing for extraction of updates.
    PropertyCreator  
    PropertyDeleter  
    PropertyPhysicalToLogicalConverter  
    PropertyRecordChange  
    PropertyTraverser  
    ReadOnlyLogVersionRepository.FixedLogVersion  
    RecordAccess
    Provides access to records, both for reading and for writing.
    RecordAccess.Loader
    Hook for loading and creating records.
    RecordAccess.RecordProxy
    A proxy for a record that encapsulates load/store actions to take, knowing when the underlying record is requested for reading or for writing.
    RecordAccessSet  
    RecordChangeSet

    RecordPropertyCursor

    Keeper of state that is about to be committed.
    RecordStorageCommandCreationContext
    Holds commit data structures for creating records in a NeoStores.

    RecordStorageReader
    Default implementation of StorageReader.

    RelationshipGroupGetter  
    RelationshipGroupGetter.RelationshipGroupPosition  
    RelationshipReferenceEncoding
    Relationship/relationship group references that are exposed from the kernel API surface into the client will have some flags encoded into them, basically to provide some context which will be lost when exiting the kernel.
    SchemaCache
    A cache of schema rules as well as enforcement of schema consistency.
    SchemaCache.IndexesRelatedToKey  
    SchemaCache.QueryCacheKey
    Sub-classes of the QueryCacheKey are used as memoization keys in the indexCache and constraintCache.
    SchemaCache.SchemaCacheState  
    SchemaRecordChangeTranslator  
    SchemaRuleAccess  
    SchemaStorage  
    TokenUpdateWork  
    TransactionApplier
    Responsible for a single transaction.
    TransactionApplier.Adapter
    Delegates to individual visit methods (see CommandVisitor) which need to be implemented, as well as TransactionApplier.Adapter.close() if applicable.
    TransactionApplierFactory
    Responsible for dealing with batches of transactions.
    TransactionApplierFactoryChain
    This class wraps several TransactionApplierFactorys which will do their work sequentially.
    TransactionRecordState
    Transaction containing commands reflecting the operations performed in the transaction.
    TransactionRecordState.CommandComparator
